items.text: “A GOOD SCIENTIST IS A PERSON WITH ORIGINAL IDEAS. A GOOD ENGINEER IS A PERSON WHO MAKES A DESIGN THAT WORKS WITH AS FEW IDEAS AS POSSIBLE. THERE ARE NO PRIMA DONNAS IN ENGINEERING.”
items.author: ― Freeman Dyson
